scripts.docker-local-dev-build: cross-env TARGETENV=dev docker compose --env-file docker/environments/local.env  -p cart-node-express-dev -f docker/docker-compose.local.yml -f docker/docker-compose.dev.override.yml  build
scripts.docker-local-dev-up: cross-env TARGETENV=dev docker compose --env-file docker/environments/local.env -p cart-node-express-dev -f docker/docker-compose.local.yml -f docker/docker-compose.dev.override.yml up -d --remove-orphans --no-build --scale cart-node=3
scripts.docker-local-prod-up: cross-env TARGETENV=prod docker compose --env-file docker/environments/local.env -p cart-node-express-prod -f docker/docker-compose.local.yml -f docker/docker-compose.prod.override.yml up -d --remove-orphans --no-build
scripts.start-dev: npm run build-docker && npm run create-namespace-dev && npm run set-context-dev && npm run helm-pack && npm run helm-upgrade-dev
scripts.start-prod: npm run create-namespace-prod && npm run set-context-prod && npm run helm-upgrade-prod
scripts.create-namespace-dev: kubectl create namespace dev-node-namespace --dry-run=client -o yaml | kubectl apply -f -
scripts.create-namespace-prod: kubectl create namespace prod-node-namespace --dry-run=client -o yaml | kubectl apply -f -
